\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{graphicx}
\usepackage{color}

\sloppy
\definecolor{lightgray}{gray}{0.5}
\setlength{\parindent}{0pt}

\begin{document}

    
    \begin{verbatim}
%Buck Boost Converter
%Voltage Ripple vs Duty Cycle
dutyCycle = linspace(0,1,1000);
Vout = 15;
fs = 50e3;
Rload = 10;
C = 100e-6;
Vripple = Vout.*dutyCycle ./ (fs*Rload*C);
figure()
plot(dutyCycle, Vripple,'r')
title('Duty Cycle vs Voltage Ripple');
xlabel('Duty Cycle');
ylabel('Voltage Ripple');
\end{verbatim}

\includegraphics [width=4in]{question7Graph_01.eps}



\end{document}
